ad_text: East Texas Sales & Service Sponsored Established C-store/travel center wholesale company is looking for a route sales representative/driver to take over some established accounts and to source and grow new accounts in the Houston Market. Someone with the drive to learn a new trade without experience would be considered. Preferably, someone in the Humble or surrounding areas. Interview process will consist of emails, phone, Skype/face-time, and formal sit-down interviews. The process will take a week or longer.
